title: Some of Our Favorite Brands Are Up to 80 Percent Off at Urban Outfitters
text:
Photo: Courtesy Retailer

Among the Labor Day sales that are worth your attention, this weekend’s sale-on-sale at Urban Outfitters is one we think is not to be missed. They’re offering an additional 40 percent off lots of already discounted women’s, men’s, and home stuff from Strategist-favorite brands like Levi’s, Patagonia, and Nalgene. Below are some deeply discounted items that particularly caught our eye, including a pair of colorful Adidas leggings, a bright bag from Topo Designs, and a delightfully quirky pillow that looks like a cat. Fair warning: Products have been selling out quickly, and sizing may be limited, so don’t dillydally.

For women

Levi’s Slouchy Denim Trucker Jacket - Long Story $36 (was $98, now 63% off) $36 at Urban Outfitters Buy

Topo Designs Accessory Nylon Shoulder Bag $12 (was $36, now 67% off) $12 at Urban Outfitters Buy

Herschel Supply Co. Fourteen Fleece Adjustable Belt Bag $12 (was $35, now 66% off) $12 at Urban Outfitters Buy

For men

For the home

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.
description: A bunch of already discounted items from Strategist-approved brands are an extra 40 percent off during Urban Outfitters’ Labor Day Sale-on-Sale, including things for women, men, and the home from Adidas, Herschel Supply Co., Levi’s, and more.
